relation: Great for these types of students
If you are a student that loves to have a social life, yet have a good education this is great for you. Mostly African-Americans attend this school, but we welcome any and everybody.
If you are able to get a car, it would be wise to do so if you are not a fan of walking. If you can't, save up money for gas if you know people that drive and cabs if they are unavailable.

It may be a little expensive to attend VSU, especially if you're an out-of-state student like myself, but it is all worth it. You will have a great and traditional college experience, as well as earn a great education.

I love it here and I'm so glad that I go to VSU! You meet great people here and in a lot of cases, some people become like family to you. I have made some mistakes, but that was all my fault and I am changing that. You just have to be focused here and do not be afraid to ask people for help. A lot of people are willing to help you any way that they can if you're willing to help yourself. I would not trade this experience for the world!

I have learned so much while being here at VSU. You are able to get to know most of your professors and it is very easy to find help; all you have to do is ask. It is also easy to get distracted by the great party scene but that is up to you and you only. If you can balance your work and social life you will be fine.
pageTitle: Virginia State University (VSU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

The most popular or active organizations on campus are the social orgs. Next, there are many activities hosted on campus mainly by TAB (Trojan Activities Board). These organizations also provide entertainment through a variety of events and forums. For example, SLOT hosts socials - which are basically on campus parties. textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Chasity from Midlothian , VA 07/25/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 12 out of 13 people found this review useful. 2 of 89 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Minority Students, Intellectual students who are focused on their studies,Virginia and non-Virginia residents, and Athletes. Tips for prospective students Virginia State offers everything a prospective student is interested in. From the comfortable residence Halls to the amazing three story library that is useful for every course not just literature and essays. Make sure to take advantage of the resources available such as the sisip program and the academic support center. You will love Virginia State University! Bang for the buck Although I am an instate student I have many friends who pay out of state tuition and we all agree on one thing: Virginia State University is worth every penny that we pay. We are employed by campus departments we enjoy the food and rooms and as
